Gilles Bertaux : Co-founder/CEO Rumble

I love building, writing and reading about products, startups, and the Web. Currently on a mission to make your webinars smarter, simpler and more efficient.

Current status: Co-founder & CEO at Rumble.
Formerly: Product Designer at TOTEMS (exit by Stripe) / Growth Hacker at Mention.

ABOUT RUMBLE

At Rumble we help companies get the most of their webinars. Our mission is to make your webinars simpler and more efficient. We strive to build the best experience possible for our users. We focus on design, high disponibility and technical capabilties.

We provide smarter webinars, you get better leads.
